name: Lafarl, Hero of the Skyfang Brigade
desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can excavate cards from the top of your Deck, equal to the number of "Skyfang Brigade" monsters you control with different names, other than "Lafarl, Hero of the Skyfang Brigade", add 1 of them to your hand, also shuffle the rest back into the Deck. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 "Skyfang Brigade" card; negate the activation. You can only use each effect of "Lafarl, Hero of the Skyfang Brigade" once per turn.
